actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to permit State and county extension services to obtain excess property from the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to permit State and county agricultural extension services engaged in cooperative agricultural extension work to obtain excess United States property from the Secretary of Agriculture, where title is retained by the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to permit State and county extension services to obtain excess property from the United States.
